languages.text: Galleon ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 7 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 3 points of damage on the fore and aft.
languages.original_text: Пластины керамита защищают судно от повреждений, нейтрализуя по 7 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} на левом и правом борту и по 3 урона на носу и корме.

traits.locale_text: Galleon Ceramite Plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 7 points of Damage on the Port and Starboard and 3 points of Damage on the Fore and Aft.
Пластины керамита защищают судно от повреждений, нейтрализуя по 7 урона на левом и правом борту и по 3 урона на носу и корме.

Galleon ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 7 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 3 points of damage on the fore and aft.

Galleon ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 7 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 3 points of damage on the fore and aft.

languages.text: Пластины керамита защищают судно от повреждений, нейтрализуя по 7 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} на левом и правом борту и по 3 урона на носу и корме.

traits.locale_text: Пластины керамита защищают судно от повреждений, нейтрализуя по 7 урона на левом и правом борту и по 3 урона на носу и корме.
Пластины керамита защищают судно от повреждений, нейтрализуя по 7 урона на левом и правом борту и по 3 урона на носу и корме.

languages.text: Die Galeonen-Ceramit-Panzerung schützt das Schiff vor {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, indem sie 7 Schadenspunkte auf {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}Backbord{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}Steuerbord{/g} sowie 3 Schadenspunkte an Bug und Heck abwehrt.
languages.original_text: Galleon ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 7 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 3 points of damage on the fore and aft.

traits.locale_text: Die Galeonen-Ceramit-Panzerung schützt das Schiff vor Schaden, indem sie 7 Schadenspunkte an {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}Backbord{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}Steuerbord{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace} und 3 Schadenspunkte an Bug und Heck abwehrt.

languages.text: Le revêtement en céramite de galion protège le vaisseau en absorbant 7 points de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}bâbord{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}tribord{/g}, et 3 points de dégâts à l'avant et à l'arrière.
languages.original_text: Galleon ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 7 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 3 points of damage on the fore and aft.

traits.locale_text: Le revêtement en céramite de galion protège le vaisseau, annulant 7 points de dégâts à {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}bâbord{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}tribord{/g}, et 3 points de dégâts à l'avant et à l'arrière.

languages.text: 星帆舰陶钢船板可保护舰船免受伤害，{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}可抵消7点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，其他各个方向可抵消3点伤害。
languages.original_text: Galleon ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 7 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 3 points of damage on the fore and aft.

traits.locale_text: 星帆舰陶钢船板可保护舰船免受伤害，{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}可抵消7点伤害，其他各个方向可抵消3点伤害。

languages.text: Las placas de ceramita de galeón protegen la nave contra el {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g}, negando 7 puntos de daño a {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}babor{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}estribor{/g} y 3 a proa y a popa.
languages.original_text: Galleon ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 7 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 3 points of damage on the fore and aft.

traits.locale_text: Las placas de ceramita de galeón protegen la nave contra el daño, negando 7 puntos de daño a {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}babor{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}estribor{/g} y 3 a proa y a popa.

languages.text: 船体を損傷から守るガレオン・セラマイト装甲。{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を7ポイント無効化し、船首と船尾のダメージを3ポイント無効化する。
languages.original_text: Galleon ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 7 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 3 points of damage on the fore and aft.

traits.locale_text: 船体を損傷から守るガレオン・セラマイト装甲。{g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}左舷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}右舷{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を7ポイント無効化し、船首と船尾のダメージを3ポイント無効化する。

languages.text: Kalyon seramidi kaplama, {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}iskele{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}sancak{/g} taraflarında 7'şer puanlık ve pruva ile kıç taraflarında da 3'er puanlık {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} yadsıyarak gemiyi zarar görmekten korur.
languages.original_text: Galleon ceramite plating protects the vessel from harm, negating 7 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on the {g|Encyclopedia:PortSpace}port{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:StarboardSpace}starboard{/g} and 3 points of damage on the fore and aft.
